attributes.action: Instigate a USA-style "financial crisis responsibility fee" scheme for UK financial institutions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: USA President Obama has announced a "financial crisis responsibility fee" scheme to deter irresponsible bank behaviour and to recoup the bail-out loans (plus interest) funded by the American tax payer. We in Britain should operate a similar scheme starting at the same time and for the same duration. We should also encourage EU and other countries to fully participate in a world-wide coordinated fashion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
